verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> you the LORD. <WH3050> I will praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> with my whole <WH3605> heart, <WH3824> in the assembly <WH5475> of the upright, <WH3477> and in the congregation. <WH5712>
The works <WH4639> of the LORD <WH3068> are great, <WH1419> sought <WH1875> out of all <WH3605> them that have pleasure <WH2656> therein.
His work <WH6467> is honorable <WH1935> and glorious: <WH1926> and his righteousness <WH6666> endures <WH5975> for ever. <WH5703>
He has made <WH6213> his wonderful <WH6381> works to be remembered: <WH2143> the LORD <WH3068> is gracious <WH2587> and full of compassion. <WH7349>
He has given <WH5414> meat <WH2964> to them that fear <WH3373> him: he will ever <WH5769> be mindful <WH2142> of his covenant. <WH1285>
He has showed <WH5046> his people <WH5971> the power <WH3581> of his works, <WH4639> that he may give <WH5414> them the heritage <WH5159> of the heathen. <WH1471>
The works <WH4639> of his hands <WH3027> are verity <WH571> and judgment; <WH4941> all <WH3605> his commandments <WH6490> are sure. <WH539>
They stand <WH5564> fast for ever <WH5703> and ever, <WH5769> and are done <WH6213> in truth <WH571> and uprightness. <WH3477>
He sent <WH7971> redemption <WH6304> to his people: <WH5971> he has commanded <WH6680> his covenant <WH1285> for ever: <WH5769> holy <WH6918> and reverend <WH3372> is his name. <WH8034>

The fear <WH3374> of the LORD <WH3068> is the beginning <WH7225> of wisdom: <WH2451> a good <WH2896> understanding <WH7922> have all <WH3605> they that do <WH6213> his commandments: his praise <WH8416> endures <WH5975> for ever. <WH5769>
